text: Luigi Albani (born 24 May 1928 in Rome) is an Italian former footballer who played for 5 seasons (50 games) in Serie A for Roma. During his Roma career he was mostly the backup goalkeeper, except for two seasons when he was first- choice: 1951–52, when Roma were in Serie B, and 1952–53. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:A.S. Roma players Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Luigi Albani
